titles.title: I will rejoice in you and be glad

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will rejoice in You and be glad
I will extol Your love more than wine
draw me unto You
And let us run together
I will rejoice in You and be glad

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We will rejoice in you and be glad
We will extol your name more than wine
Draw us unto you and let us run together
We will rejoice in you and be glad
